segments.text: From my view, the kitchen seems ordinary at first glance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is attentively drying the plate with her towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But then I spot the faucet running full blast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is spilling over, creating a flood on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is submerged, yet she keeps working away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The upper cabinets are open, cookie jar in sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is climbing up, stool tilting dangerously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One hand in the jar, the other clutching a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl watches intently, hand raised in anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's sweet how they're sharing this moment of fun.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Still, the wet floor could turn this into a slip-and-fall nightmare.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The outside garden looks so calm through the window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but cringe at the mess inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to intervene before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
